attributes.action:
Legalize Capital Punishment In The UK
(The Death Penalty)
attributes.additional_details: I believe this because if someone has killed multiple people then (s)he should be put to death because if someone loses a life then the person who took it should lose theirs as well. Also, it will act as a deterrent for people because no one really wants to lose their life. I hope you can all share my views on this by signing this partition and help make the country a safer place to live in, for all.
attributes.background:
I am a citizenship student doing my active citizenship project to legalize capital punishment.
I strongly believe in this because it will help all sorts of people who constantly live in fear of people who are as bad and should be put to death.
